name: Melissa Lim Chin Ling
speech: A common love for popping and locking, and a shared desire for a conducive environment for dancers to learn and grow while having fun, made NUS Funkstyles what it is today.

name: Louis Kwek
speech: We wanted to dance in NUS and realised many like-minded street dancers did too, so it happened rather naturally from random sessions, into a more structured format.

name: Wang Yingmin
speech: The non-toxic dance culture, humility and respect towards every dancer in the dance cyphers - these were what made me decide to embark on this journey with my friends.

name: Reico Ng
speech: It felt like we naturally transitioned from being a rag-tag group who would consistently gather at (and get chased out of) AS7 to something more structured and catered for everyone.

name: Shih Mu Jung
speech: You fall in love. It just happens!

name: Lee Zhanhui
speech: The passion of dance brought together a group of like-minded friends who wanted to spread the funk and freestyle culture (which was not prevalent in NUS then) to NUS!

name: Yong Tinshen
speech: A bunch of us got together, went a lil nuts, to see how far we could stretch it. It took some effort, but it was worth it.
